books.author: by Tom Felton
books.description: The actor known for playing the villain Draco Malfoy in the “Harry Potter” movies recounts his life on and off the set of the film series.
books.name: BEYOND THE WAND

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize–winning biographer portrays the life of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: AND THERE WAS LIGHT

books.author: by Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
books.name: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: by Paul Newman
books.description: The late movie star’s memoir reveals intimate details about his personal relationships and professional rivalries; compiled and edited by David Rosenthal.
books.name: THE EXTRAORDINARY LIFE OF AN ORDINARY MAN

books.author: by Alan Rickman
books.description: The late stage and screen actor’s diaries from 1993 to 2016; edited by Alan Taylor.
books.name: MADLY, DEEPLY

books.author: by Maggie Haberman
books.description: The New York Times White House correspondent traces events from Donald Trump’s rise in New York City through to his post-presidency.
books.name: CONFIDENCE MAN

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The conservative commentator’s Killing series profiles Elvis Presley, John Lennon and Muhammad Ali.
books.name: KILLING THE LEGENDS

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Benjamin Netanyahu
books.description: An autobiography by the former prime minister of Israel.
books.name: BIBI

books.author: by Ralph Macchio
books.description: The star of “Cobra Kai” discusses the personal and pop culture impact of “The Karate Kid.”
books.name: WAXING ON

books.author: by Kelly Ripa
books.description: The Daytime Emmy Award-winning TV host shares stories from her life on and off screen.
books.name: LIVE WIRE

books.author: by Gabrielle Blair
books.description: Arguments on the subject of abortion that focus on men’s lack of accountability in preventing unwanted pregnancies.
books.name: EJACULATE RESPONSIBLY

books.author: by Robin Wall Kimmerer
books.description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.
books.name: BRAIDING SWEETGRASS

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: The astrophysicist and director of the Hayden Planetarium delves into subjects including politics, religion, gender and race.
books.name: STARRY MESSENGER

books.author: by Anand Giridharadas
books.description: The author of “Winners Take All” profiles people working to use persuasion during a time of polarization.
books.name: THE PERSUADERS
